mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO userNo, USER_ID userId, USER_PWD userPwd, USER_ADDRESS userAddress, USER_NAME userName, USER_EMAIL userEmail, ROLE role, USER_STATE userState, USER_DATE userDate FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_STATE= 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_ADDRESS, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, ROLE, USER_STATE, USER_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userAddress}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{role}, 'Y', SYSDATE )
